style.imagePromptTemplate: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, {subject}, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire
style.languageNotes: Keep every blurb understandable by an average tech worker; reference real 2024-2025 happenings before leaning into satire.

templates.title: Template Title
templates.body: One-paragraph summary of a 2025 tech backlash scenario.
templates.imagePrompt: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, laid-off engineers debating drone strike ethics, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire

events.title: San Francisco Compute Rationing Stop
events.body: In 2025, OpenAI's 2025 compute rationing roadshow stops in San Francisco after the Senate subpoena on GPU hoarding. Sam Altman floods San Francisco with cameras at the Embarcadero pier stage, and our crews can bend the spectacle to tilt public support, funds, AGI momentum, and heat before security closes ranks.

choices.label: Hijack Altman's rationing Q&A in San Francisco.
choices.body: Beam in union pay stubs while Altman dodges the pause pledge.

choices.label: Slip our analysts into the OpenAI support tent.
choices.body: Clone the compliance tablets that track emergency GPU shipments.

choices.label: Lift badge stock from the merch kiosk.
choices.body: Pocket NFC laminates before security clocks the swap.

events.imagePrompt: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, activists surrounding 2025 OpenAI compute rationing stage in San Francisco, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire

events.title: Phoenix Waymo Curfew Briefing
events.body: In 2025, Waymo's 2025 midnight curfew pilots roll through Phoenix after the Phoenix protests. Sundar Pichai floods Phoenix with cameras at the Roosevelt Row stage, and our crews can bend the spectacle to tilt public support, funds, AGI momentum, and heat before security closes ranks.

choices.label: Hijack the Waymo safety briefing livestream.
choices.body: Loop curfew dashcam clips that show empty streets and idle cops.

choices.label: Shadow the lidar calibration van.
choices.body: Swap the firmware on their night patrol routes.

choices.label: Borrow the spare lidar rigs from their demo tent.
choices.body: Wheel them onto our shuttle before PR notices.

events.title: Phoenix Desert Cooling Hearing
events.body: In 2025, Microsoft's 2025 desert cooling purchase hearings hit Phoenix after the Arizona water lawsuits. Satya Nadella floods Phoenix with cameras at the Tempe municipal court, and our crews can bend the spectacle to tilt public support, funds, AGI momentum, and heat before security closes ranks.

choices.label: Broadcast the evaporative tower protest in Phoenix.
choices.body: Cut in footage of dried canals while Nadella talks sustainability.

choices.label: Tap the environmental sensors in the testimony room.
choices.body: Copy the discharge readings before they get scrubbed.

choices.label: Stash the trial desal membranes in our van.
choices.body: Borrow the demo kit before the lobbyists pack it up.
